bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: A wholesale grocer, the New River Valley Grocery Company operated in Fries (Grayson County), Virginia during the early 20th century. According to a notation on the first page of the book, the business commenced operation in 1905. It it listed in a directory of Grayson County businesses in 1911. Thomas C. Vaughan (1870-1938) served as the company's president for at least 14 years, beginning in 1906.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a single order book maintained by the New River Grocery Company, a wholesale business operating in Fries, Virginia during the early 20th century. The book contains orders placed by customers and includes lists of items ordered and prices for each. Most of the company's customers were located in in Virginia's Galax, Pulaski and Wythe counties.
